parameters.name: Ipv6Address
parameters.description:
The IPv6 addresses that you want to assign to the ENI. You can specify up to 10 IPv6 addresses.

Example: Ipv6Address.1=2001:db8:1234:1a00::\*\*\*\*

> You must specify `Ipv6Addresses.N` or `Ipv6AddressCount` but cannot specify both.

parameters.name: Ipv6AddressCount
parameters.description:
The number of IPv6 addresses that you want to generate at random for the ENI. Valid values: 1 to 10.

> You must specify `Ipv6Addresses.N` or `Ipv6AddressCount` but cannot specify both.

parameters.name: Ipv6Prefix
parameters.description: > This parameter is in invitational preview and is unavailable for general users.

parameters.name: Ipv6PrefixCount
parameters.description: > This parameter is in invitational preview and is unavailable for general users.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The region ID of the ENI. You can call the [DescribeRegions](~~25609~~) operation to query the most recent region list.
